effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

Warmongering Gladiator's Ironskin Spaulders

spells.description: Equip: Taking damage has a chance to erupt the ground, covering you in a layer of dark oil that absorbs 439,398 damage for 15 sec. When the shield is broken, it splatters nearby enemies for 105,503 Shadow damage.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 2,879 or your lowest secondary stat by 3,632 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Moonlit Cloak of Unrelenting Justice

spells.description:
Equip: Your melee attacks and abilities have a chance to befoul the blood of your enemy dealing 337,850 Nature damage over 10 sec. Additional injections overlap.

If a target dies while afflicted with your Befouled Blood, siphon the remaining poison back into the blade granting your next melee abilities 168,923 additional Nature damage.
